text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: In this vast universe――there exist inexplicable lifeforms. Lifeforms that we cannot perceive.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: 『Aliens』 and multi-dimensional organisms inhabiting an 『Astral Body』. Someday, one such existence may decide to descend upon this planet.
――Tracen Academy at night. I had some business to attend to…… but then I heard a sound from overhead.
If something had happened with the HVAC system, it'd be a big problem. I borrowed a key from the night staff and hurried to the roof to see what happened.
And, there on the roof――
Was a girl I didn't recognize. Those were Uma Musume ears. But……the shape seemed a little off.
No matter who it was, even an Uma Musume couldn't jump to the roof of a locked school building. Just who was this girl……?
My voice was shaky out of fear. Would my words……even get through to her?
…………"Communication"

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Communication" with Neo Universe……would you like to try it? That is, if……you're "INTI" it.
Neo Universe……was that this girl's name? I felt like I could somewhat understand her words.
Was she an Uma Musume, or some mysterious lifeform shaped like an Uma Musume……? Either way, it seemed like we were on the same wavelength. In that case……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Discontinuity"……I was trying to repair it.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Because the scale that rang out……was one of my 『Favorites』. When it resonates within, it puts me at 『Peace』.
――Repair the discontinuity. I didn't know what that meant, and I don't know what would happen after that. But……
The girl herself didn't seem to be harmful to those around her.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Your alignment is……"Educator". 『Trainer』……is what you're called?
I don't have an Uma Musume that I'm responsible for. But when I told her I was a trainer……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Trainer……If that is a complementary existence……then that is what I "seek".

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Monitoring" of a "Campaign"…… No, it's something beyond that……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: It's not simply "Monitoring"……『???』……
……It seemed like she was requesting something of me. However, she seemed unable to properly put it in to words.
This girl who looked like an Uma Musume, "Neo Universe", just what was it she wanted?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: First, to "manifest". To be "perceived"……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: If I can't do that, then I won't "be on track"……
Neo Universe looked up to the sky. I looked up as well, wondering what was up there. When I tried to tell her "I don't see anything"……
She was……nowhere to be seen. As if she had disappeared in to a rift in space-time.
"Neo Universe"……had she even really existed? Or had I just been imagining things?
――Several days after that. At a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Seems like there will be a lot of promising girls entering today.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm looking forward to how the race will turn out. Out of all of them……

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: W-who's that……?
That girl, "Neo Universe" had suddenly appeared at the racetrack. And then――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: I'm going to……『Compete』

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Neo Universe is a……"STDA" ……so to acquire "synapses"……
Everyone was stunned as she walked out on to the turf. And so, the mysterious girl unexpectedly entered the race.
